name: Fellow Consulting AG
overview: The Fellow Consulting AG, located in Munich, is a recognized technology and solution partner in the field of Customer Relationship Management (CRM). With one of the most experienced team of Oracle / Siebel certified consultants in Germany and Europe, Fellow supports numerous clients in the finance, automotive, pharmaceutical and telecommunications industries from the conception to the implementation of their CRM projects and integration into the existing IT architecture. Based on the profound experience of the personnel in the CRM environment, Fellow is also developing innovative products such as the CRM 2.0 Toolset CRM-Gadget (http://www.crm-gadget.com) or the Oracle CRM On Demand Offline Client CRM Gadget ² Go (http://desktop.crm-gadget.com).
